sentences.sContent: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.sCn: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.sContent: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.sCn: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.sContent: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.sCn: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

sentences.sContent: ...The company's self-driving cars have done well over a million miles across various states in the US...
...Kung Fu has hundreds of various styles and it is the most frequently exercised martial arts form...
...Great innovators are good at connecting concepts from various academic fields...
...who stayed up around an hour and a haft later on various days throughout the summer to watch the Cup...
...The gastro-pub has existed in various locations in Hong Kong since 2002...
...Charity groups organized various activities to raise money for the survivors of the earthquake...

...Campus plays a crucial role in educating the young generation and the consciousness of “green campus” will definitely produce a profound effect on students’ various environmental protection activities after their graduation...
...The construction of “a green campus” will greatly stimulate students to take part in various environmental protection activities...
...It goes without saying that various activities brought by modern technology have greatly broadened our horizon and brought much excitement to us...

phrases.pCn: 各种款式；款式齐全；款式多样

words.tran: 不同地；多方面地；个别地；多彩地

trans.tranOther: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing
